v.v: Yahweh is great, and he deserves to be greatly praised in the city where he lives,
That city on a high hill is beautiful;
God is in the strong towers there,
Many kings gathered with their armies to attack our city,
but when they saw it, they were amazed;
Because they were very afraid, they trembled
They shook as ships sailing from Tarshish shake in a strong wind.
We had heard that this city was glorious,
God, here in your temple we think about how you love us as you promised to do.
People all over the earth will praise you
The people who live at Mount Zion should be happy!
You Israelite people should walk around Mount Zion
notice the walls there and examine their strongest parts
Say to your children, “This is the city of our God, the one who lives forever;

v: which is built on Zion, his sacred hill.
it is the city where the true God, the great king, lives,
and it causes people all over the world to rejoice when they see it.
and he shows that he protects the people in that city.
they became terrified, and ran away.
like a woman who is about to give birth to a child.
and now we have seen that it is.
It is the city in which Yahweh, commander of the angel armies, lives.
It is the city that God will preserve forever.
because you rule powerfully and justly.
The people in all the cities of Judah should rejoice
so that you can tell your children about them.
he will guide us during all of our lives.”
